bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there is a black object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: it is prohibited to lift and relocate a container
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted, but only soft objects are permitted
